meanings.definition: Having a pleasing appearance or attractive physical features.
meanings.sent1: The puppy was handsomer than the other dogs at the shelter.
meanings.sent2: She thought the sunset was handsomer than any painting she had seen.
meanings.sent3: The handsomer cat in the neighborhood always gets the most attention from passersby.
meanings.sent4: The handsomer flowers in the garden seemed to glow in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The handsomer smile on her face lit up the room.

meanings.definition: More attractive than average in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The handsomer actor won the hearts of many fans with his charm.
meanings.sent2: The handsomer dress caught the eye of everyone at the party.
meanings.sent3: The handsomer cake at the bakery was sold out within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The handsomer house on the street stood out with its elegant design.
meanings.sent5: The handsomer voice of the singer captivated the audience.
